Description: We are currently looking for a Senior Structural Engineer with the following specifications: (DM Approved G+12)·    A Bachelor Degree in Civil Engineering.·    Must have overall 10 years of experience out of which at least 5 years should be with an Engineering Consultant office.·    Candidate must be approved from Dubai Municipality on G+12.·    Excellent user of Structural Analysis and Design softwares (e.g. ETABS, SAFE, STAAD, etc.…) and Revit & AutoCAD.·    Familiar with Local and International Codes of Practice for Structural Design.·    Demonstrated ability to manage multiple projects. Ability to meet stated customer initiated deadlines.·    Must be goal orientated.·    Must have good organizational skills.·    Must be proactive and energetic.·    Must be flexible and creative.·    Being able to review Structural construction workshop drawings.·    Being able to conduct Structural works Supervision if required.Skills
